sentences.sContent: Canada and France should do the same.
sentences.sContent_eng: Canada and France should do the same.
sentences.sCn: 加拿大和法国也应该这样做。

sentences.sContent: They should evacuate all of France, and start all over.
sentences.sContent_eng: They should evacuate all of France, and start all over.
sentences.sCn: 他们应当疏散所有的法国人，然后重新开始。

sentences.sContent: We leave Dover at ten and we should be across in France by midnight.
sentences.sContent_eng: We leave Dover at ten and we should be across in France by midnight.
sentences.sCn: 十点钟离开多佛的话， 我们午夜时分可以到达对面的法国。
